title: Developper (Apprenteship)
description: Working in a startup is very rewarding, you get to work on so many different things. Learned a lot during this apprenticeship, some technical and non-technical skills. Graaly creates a mobile app that allows you to create an escape game anywhere, at home, at work, public places...
missions: Transforming a NodeJs Api into an AWS Lambda API
Creating IOT Objects that communicate with the app using Bluetooth
Creating a complete management platform for real time view of the players progress
Project management with training of interns

title: Developper
description: This was my first real job! Learned a new game engine and how to create touch screen optimized interfaces. Moovlab makes a connected bracelet that is linked to a video game that allows you to do sports while having fun!
missions: Creation of a touch based interface for selecting video games

title: Electronics developper (Internship)
description: Working With Arduino is easy, working with bare metal microcontrollers is on another level! The goal of the internship was simulating sensors with STM32 Nucleo cards, including address allocation, registers, SPI protocol, not an easy task. I learned that I love Arduino, but this kind of electronics was a bit too much. Since then, I have learned much more.
missions: Creating a simulation of real sensors inside drones
Recreating the memory allocation of different sensors

title: Mobile App Developper (Internship)
description: This was my first working experience, 4 months working with the Microsoft stack to create a mobile app allowing camping owners to bee keep up to date on their new reservations. Alliance Reseau create a backend service that allow campingâ€™s, hotels, and over establishments to integrate payment into their website.
missions: Creating a mobile app with Xamarin
Integrating the application with hocks in the existing API

title: Your company here ! Lets Chat About It !
description: I am always looking for oportunities, lets chat about it !
